CHAT.comment: context notes say Mot watches from a distance , very hands-off , especially because Chi wants to hide the letter from her! In between Chi's spurts of writing , MOT and Chi talk a lot (mostly teasing). Mot asks permission from EXP to interfere when Chi starts sentence with lowercase letter. Mot doesn't tell Chi what the problem is , but Chi figures it out.
Dear Melissa , after school today will you help the teacher. Your friend , Chi

u.a: EXP talking to other exp in background
I think she has written Dear M
Chi is covering the page so Mot can't see
because Chi wrote the M for either Melissa or Mom ? ? ? ? or just because Mot can't see the page
collecting papers to put back into her briefcase Chi's sister had pulled them out
probably whoever sleeps upstairs , could be a different apartment
sees that Chi started sentence with a lowercase letter
lots_of paper rustling sounds in the meantime
